    • Field Detail

      • mapfunction

        public static final java.lang.String mapfunction
        This static final String, is a hard-coded JavaScript function, stored as a static final String. It is the "Map" function part of the MapReduce function. Its job is to Map all of the fines together, and Map all of the amounts paid together also.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • reducefunction

        public static final java.lang.String reducefunction
        This static final String, is a hard-coded JavaScript function, stored as a static final String. It is the "Reduce" function part of the MapReduce function. Its job is to Reduce all of the amounts paid together, and return the total amount.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public org.bson.Document getBook(java.lang.String isbn)
        This method returns a book document object, that is specified by the ISBN parameter.
        Parameters:
        isbn - The unique identifier of the book object
        Returns:

      • getStudent

        public org.bson.Document getStudent(java.lang.String studentNumber)

      • createLoan

        public void createLoan(org.bson.Document loan)
        This method creates a new loan document, within the Loan Collection of MongoDB.
        Parameters:
        loan - The loan that is wished to be created with the Loan Collection

      • getLoanHistory

        public com.mongodb.client.FindIterable<org.bson.Document> getLoanHistory(java.lang.String studentNumber,
                                                                         java.util.Date fromDate,
                                                                         java.util.Date toDate)
        This method returns the entire loan history of any given student, for the time-frame specified from the date parameters parsed.
        Parameters:
        studentNumber - A unique student number to identify the student
        fromDate - The date that will determine the day at which the returned history will start at.
        toDate - The date that will determine the day at which the returned history will end at.
        Returns:
        The loan history, as a FindIterable array of Documents.

      • getFineHistory

        public com.mongodb.client.MongoCursor getFineHistory(java.lang.String studentNumber,
                                                     java.util.Date fromDate,
                                                     java.util.Date toDate)
        This method returns the entire fine history of any given student, for the time-frame specified from the date parameters parsed.
        Parameters:
        studentNumber - A unique student number to identify the student
        fromDate - The date that will determine the day at which the returned history will start at.
        toDate - The date that will determine the day at which the returned history will end at.
        Returns:
        The fine history, as a MongoCursor.

      • returnBook

        public void returnBook(java.lang.String loanRecord,
                       java.lang.String bookIsbn)
        This method inserts a book as a returned book, into the loan record specified at the user input.
        Parameters:
        loanRecord - The loan record that the book being returned is associated with.
        bookIsbn - The ISBN of the book that is being returned.

      • payFine

        public void payFine(java.lang.String loanRecord,
                    java.lang.String isbn,
                    double amountPaid)
        This method inserts a fine document, associated with an already loaned loan record and book.
        Parameters:
        loanRecord - The loan record associated with the fine
        isbn - The ISBN of the book associated with the fine
        amountPaid - The amount of fine that is being paid
